mapper.select: SELECT user_id as userId, address_id as addressId, name as name, lastname as lastname, email as email, cellphone as cellphone, telephone as telephone, username as username FROM user where user_id=#{userId} and status = 1
SELECT username as username FROM user where username=#{username} and user_id!=#{userId} and status = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET address_id=#{addressId}, name=#{name},lastname=#{lastname}, email=#{email},cellphone=#{cellphone}, telephone=#{telephone},username= #{username}, password=#{password} WHERE user_id= #{userId} and status = 1
